markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=568)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), [Erecura](/Deities.aspx?ID=151), [Grundinnar](/Deities.aspx?ID=88), [Irez](/Deities.aspx?ID=121), [Magdh](/Deities.aspx?ID=97), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=100), [The Freeing Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=231), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You grant the target brief foresight. The target gains a +1 status bonus to its next initiative roll, after which the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7th level.
name: Anticipate Peril

text: Anticipate Peril Source Gods & Magic pg. 107 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Alseta, Erecura, Grundinnar, Irez, Magdh, Shyka, The Freeing Flame, Urban Prosperity Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Duration 10 minutes --- You grant the target brief foresight. The target gains a +1 status bonus to its next initiative roll, after which the spell ends. --- Heightened (+2) The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7th level.
